meanings.definition: The act of marrying one person while still legally married to another.
meanings.sent1: Bigamy is when someone marries a second person while already married to someone else.
meanings.sent2: He was arrested for bigamy after it was discovered he had two wives.
meanings.sent3: The sitcom character accidentally committed bigamy by unknowingly marrying two people on the same day.
meanings.sent4: In the movie, the protagonist's bigamy was a symbol of his internal conflict and indecision.
meanings.sent5: The scandalous case of bigamy shocked the small town and made headlines for weeks.

meanings.definition: The crime of entering into a marriage with one person while still legally married to another.
meanings.sent1: Bigamy is considered a serious offense in many countries.
meanings.sent2: The court sentenced him to prison for committing bigamy.
meanings.sent3: The detective solved the case of bigamy by uncovering hidden marriage records.
meanings.sent4: Her bigamy was a betrayal of trust and a violation of the law.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of bigamy can be devastating for all parties involved.
